Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Relates to exempting teachers from additional certifications or prerequisites associated with running certain after-school programs
Summary: Relates to exempting teachers from additional certifications or prerequisites associated with running certain after-school programs except for background checks; and exempts any teacher working in any school building of a city school district of a city having one hundred twenty-five thousand inhabitants or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง17, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exempting teachers from additional certifications or prerequisites associated with running certain after-school programs
